cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface on an object.

div.l: You should not kiss your beloved son
You should not pelt your hated son
The complaint of the netherworld would seize you
For the recumbent one, for the recumbent one
For hero(?) Ninazu, the recumbent one
Where will ... be brought to (how will ... succeed?) ...
Because of my uttered words, ... does not ... weeping
If I tell you about the regulations of the netherworld
You must sit and weep, and I shall sit and weep
The penis that ... has “planted"(?), by which you have pleased your libido
Like the wood of a dilapidated house(?), it is infested by parasites(?)
Having said “where is the vagina? I shall go to her”
(That) vagina is filled with dust like a crevice
The lord said “alas” and sat in the dust
